channel.title: Updating client so other versions are not usable?
channel.description: Hey. I just udated a client I had to make it so that cheat client cannot be used by changing the UID, anyway. I want to make a client update or something like a new client release that my players will have to use in order to play. I dont want them to be able to play with with the old client because that will allow the cheat client.

item.title: Updating client so other versions are not usable?
item.dc:creator: @Krajix Krajix
item.description:
@Krajix wrote:

Hey. I just udated a client I had to make it so that cheat client cannot be used by changing the UID, anyway. I want to make a client update or something like a new client release that my players will have to use in order to play. I dont want them to be able to play with with the old client because that will allow the cheat client.
